company_name: SOUTH JERSEY HEAT AND COOL LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY
capabilities_narrative:
Full-service Heating, Ventilation and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Contractor that specializes in Federal projects including engineering, construction, remodels, tenant improvements, replacements, preventative maintenance, and repair.
South Jersey Heating and Cooling specializes in all types of HVAC Services to include Process Piping.
South Jersey Heating and Cooling can handle small and medium contracts as project performance of over $300,000.
Full office staff and on call, after hours, emergency technicians capable of documentation and electronic communications.
Building Automation Proficient with capability to collaborate with Original Equipment Manufacturer.
Full array of support staff and organizations.
Total project capability.
Every capability concerning HVAC from Rooftop Packaged Systems, chillers, pumps, thermostats, mini split heat pumps, heat pumps, gas piping and hvac piping, furnace and AC Coils, refrigerant and environmental rules and regulations.

Cardinal Regent Consulting LLC (CRC) is a Minority Owned Small Disadvantaged 8(a) Firm Located in Washington DC Metro Area. We provide professional services to Federal, State and Local Government. Our exceptional service areas include: Administrative Support Services, Medical Records Management, Medical and Dental Non- Clinical Case Management and Behavioral Health Services, Information Technology and Program Management Support

CTI provides environmental and demolition services.  Safety training and environmental testing and monitoring.  Site inspections. Phase I/II assessments. Construction management. Hazardous materials testing, remediation and lead and asbestos abatement and other engineering and technology related services.

MUNRO Enterprises is a team of talented experts with successful experience in operations, finance, and human resources combined with a broad array of industry experience in other areas, such as: Defense, Intelligence, Technology, Engineering, Training, Law Enforcement, Healthcare, and Telecommunications. These broad experiences enable us to provide real management consulting services - assessing what is really going on in your organization - and providing actionable solutions. Our experience and expertise form the basis for our comprehensive approach to providing the right consulting services to our clients. At MUNRO Enterprises, we do not believe that 'one size fits all'.  We take the time to truly understand not only our clients’ growth objectives, but their operational models and their corporate cultures to ensure we provide services that foster and drive improvement and growth.

Proudly serving U.S. federal government agencies since 2008, OPTiMO is an IT services provider with areas of expertise spanning design and development, cloud, data, engineering and integration, and innovation solutions and research. We've earned the unwavering trust of our customers, who cite the exceptional quality of our work and our smart, collaborative team for consistently ensuring project success.

With clients ranging from health care, transportation and hospitality to tourism, public utilities and political campaigns, Communications LAB is a full service boutique agency with the expertise of a big agency - without the big agency price tag.


We're ready and waiting to provide you with focused communications consulting services, strategic planning, crisis communications, media relations and community outreach services you need to reach your target audiences.  We invite you to contact us and let the Comm LAB staff help you discover your voice.

We specialize in designing, implementing and managing the automation of business processes and building controls for corporations and government entities with innovative technology and communications solutions. Some of our service offerings include, cloud based order fulfillment and help-desk solutions. - Wi-Fi and distributed antenna solutions (DAS) Mobile device management and fulfillment services Virtualization Solutions - VMWare Certified Professional - Wireline solution implementation and management services - Project Management Services - Machine to Machine (M2M) solutions - Data Center Equipment and Solutions  BASELAYER - Value Added Reseller (VAR) - technology and communications products - TEM and bill consolidation services - Security technology solutions - WAN/LAN Solutions
